name: boilerplate
author: Gabriel Escabora

scripts.start: npm run clean && gulp --colors && npx gulp watch --colors
scripts.build: npm run clean && gulp --colors --production && npx gulp --colors --production
scripts.dev: npm run build && npx gulp watch --colors --production

description: * See a list of products; * Be able to add or remove items to the cart and get instant visual feedback; * See the products added to the cart.
